website_summaries.verdict: A functional cash box with plenty of space for other items.
pros: Clips on the bill drawers hold the money in place for transport
Bill drawer is well-constructed and can hold a lot of bills
A good choice for fundraisers and school events
cons: Dividers between the bills are removable and may accidentally lift when you are trying to remove money

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought I was buying.... Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The coin slots seemed backwards to me and the inside was made fabric cover cardboard. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hong

customer_reviews.title: Money down the drain
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk -lock got stuck in locked position in less that 30 days - had to pry it open with tools to get my money out . I would never recommend this box .
customer_reviews.author: S. Santerelli

customer_reviews.title: The students enjoy opening the safe and placing the money the money ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this safe for fundraising at my school. The students enjoy opening the safe and placing the money the money in the tray and underneath the tray as well. It makes collecting money more organizing and efficient. At the end of recess and lunch the students bring me to safe and I lock it with the key. Having that feature ensures me that throughout that no students can open the safe and take money from the safe.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Peniche

customer_reviews.title: Very light, great for low risk transactions.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for putting important papers into storage. However, I ended up using it to help a neighbor with a yard sale. It was perfect for that. This is a light weight box, it feels like plastic but I understand it is aluminum. There are 2 bill slots and 3 coin slow in the upper tray. The bill slots have a lever to hold bills in place, perfect for outdoor events and wind. If you need protection for low risk transactions, this works great. It could also work as a safe place to keep medications if young children are in your home. It’s not going to stop a motivated thief but it isn’t really for that.
customer_reviews.author: Quickbeam

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sturdy Cash Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight but sturdy aluminum cash box with a key locking mechanism only. Some of the graphics on the front look like they are functional for locking but really the only two functions are the lever to open the box and the key hole to lock/unlock it. Two keys are provided to help insure one is not lost. The inside has a lift out tray for holding money and space underneath the tray for extra bills or papers. Yes, this is ideal more for yard sales, fundraising, etc. but I may keep our petty cash in it and hidden away for quick access when I need cash in hand when not in use for those purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Anne Heiner

customer_reviews.title: A handy thing to have at my book signings!
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this quite a bit, there are a lot of good features that make this better than my old one. The easy to grasp handle, the smooth rounded corners, and the holders that keep your money from blowing away. The only flaw is that if you put change in the holder and tilt the box, change is scattered all over the inside. I found some gray foam that I was able to place in the lid and that helped, but I think the company should have did that and not me.
customer_reviews.author: Mick McArt

customer_reviews.title: Well made and convenient for petty cash
customer_reviews.text: I got this for use in an office setting for petty cash but also is great for use during yard sales and other fund-raisers where quick access to sorted cash is needed without any type of major security. No, this won't stop someone from stealing - it is easy enough to take off with the entire box. What it will do is put a barrier between cash and others while helping keep things sorted and secure. Easy to carry, nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rugged character and neat design from the handle to the edges.
customer_reviews.text: Nice rugged character and neat design from the handle to the edges. This is a very nice cash box, though could be used for other safe keeping, e.g. jewelry as the money divider part is easily removeable from the box. This product looks at least as good as the photo; not disappointed at al.
customer_reviews.author: promethian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case
customer_reviews.text: Must have for those yard sales, this easy to use there’s a release lever that is lockable. Enough space in the bottom for extra money or paper work as needed. It looks great, the handle feels solid, this should last for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dawgs Fam

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, sturdy cash box
customer_reviews.text: This is great for garage sales and festivals. Nice and sturdy. Thus makes it easy to make change and keep your money safe. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

product_meta.title: BUYaSafe Aluminum Cash Box B298
product_meta.description: High quality aluminum cash box for daily use or special events. Great for office use, fairs, parties, clubs, Schools and much more. Durable aluminum construction with chrome folding carrying handle for easy portability. Spring load lid will stay up when opened and spring loaded bill holders will keep money secured. The currency and change tray is removable with plenty of space underneath for checks and receipts. Spring loaded locking latch. Cash box Dimensions: 10-7/8"w x 7-3/4"d x 4-1/2"H weight: 3 lbs.
feature_bullets: 4 Coin Compartments and 1 paper clip compatment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars17 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
